remarks: The functor category is a category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fuccat.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fuccat.r $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
fuccat.s $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
fuccatid.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
fuccatid $p |- ( ph -> ( Q e. Cat /\ ( Id ` Q ) = ( f e. ( C Func D ) |-> ( .1. o. ( 1st ` f ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d C f $.
$d D f $.
$d Q f $.
$d f ph $.
